member.name: NC_ADDRESS
member.summary: Contains information that describes a network address.

member.name: NC_ADDRESS.pAddrInfo
member.summary: A pointer to a NET_ADDRESS_INFO structure that describes the network address, either a named address or an IP address.

member.name: NC_ADDRESS.PortNumber
member.summary: The network port number, if the address described by pAddrInfo is an IP address.

member.name: NC_ADDRESS.PrefixLength
member.summary: The prefix length corresponding to the address, if the address described by pAddrInfo is an IP address.
